[03] ^b^tasmaa tathaagatoti vuccatii^eb^ti ya.m yathaa lokena gata.m, tassa tatheva gatattaa tathaagatoti vuccati. paa.liya.m pana ``abhisambuddha''nti vutta.m, ta.m tathaagatasaddena samaanattha.m. iminaa tathaadassibhaavato tathaagatoti ayamattho dassito hoti. vutta~nheta.m dhammasenaapatinaa --
[21] ``na tassa addi.t.thamidhatthi ki~nci,
[27] atho avi~n~naatamajaanitabba.m.
[26] sabba.m abhi~n~naasi yadatthi neyya.m,
[22] tathaagato tena samantacakkhuu''ti.. (mahaani0 156; cuu.lani0 mogharaajamaa.navapucchaaniddesa 85; pa.ti0 ma0 1.121).
[03] suttantepi ^a^M0.0350^ea^ vutta.m bhagavataa --

[02] ``ya.m ^a^V0.0320^ea^, bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa...pe0... sadevamanussaaya pajaaya di.t.tha.m suta.m muta.m ^a^P2.0190^ea^ vi~n~naata.m patta.m pariyesita.m anuvicarita.m manasaa, tamaha.m jaanaami, tamaha.m abbha~n~naasi.m, ta.m tathaagatassa vidita.m, ta.m tathaagato na upa.t.thaasii''ti (a0 ni0 4.24).

[03] ^b^ya~nca, bhikkhave, ratti.m tathaagato anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambujjhatii^eb^ti yassa~nca visaakhapu.n.namarattiya.m tathaa aagataadiatthena tathaagato bhagavaa bodhima.n.de aparaajitapalla"nke nisinno ti.n.na.m maaraana.m matthaka.m madditvaa uttaritaraabhaavato anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m aasavakkhaya~naa.nena saddhi.m sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.na.m adhigacchati. ^b^ya~nca ratti.m anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbaayatii^eb^ti yassa~nca visaakhapu.n.namarattiya.myeva kusinaaraaya.m upavattane mallaana.m saalavane yamakasaalaanamantare anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbaayati. ^b^ya.m etasmi.m antare^eb^ti imaasa.m dvinna.m saupaadisesaanupaadisesanibbaanadhaatuuna.m vemajjhe pa~ncacattaaliisavassaparimaa.ne kaale pa.thamabodhiyampi, majjhimabodhiyampi, pacchimabodhiyampi ya.m suttageyyaadippabheda.m dhamma.m ^b^bhaasati^eb^ niddisanavasena, ^b^lapati^eb^ uddhisanavasena, ^b^niddisati^eb^ pa.tiniddisanavasena. ^b^sabba.m ta.m tatheva hotii^eb^ti ta.m etthantare desita.m sabba.m suttageyyaadinava"nga.m buddhavacana.m atthato bya~njanato ca anupavajja.m anuuna.m anadhika.m sabbaakaaraparipu.n.na.m raagamadanimmadana.m...pe0... mohamadanimmadana.m, natthi tattha vaalaggamattampi avakkhalita.m, ekamuddikaaya la~nchita.m viya ekanaa.liyaa mita.m viya ekatulaaya tulita.m viya ca ta.m tatheva hoti yassatthaaya bhaasita.m, ekanteneva tassa saadhanato, ^b^no a~n~nathaa^eb^. tasmaa tatha.m, avitatha.m, ana~n~natha.m. etena tathaavaaditaaya tathaagatoti dasseti. gadaattho aya.m gatasaddo dakaarassa takaara.m katvaa, tasmaa tatha.m gadatiiti tathaagatoti attho. atha vaa aagadana.m aagado, vacananti attho. tatho avipariito aagado yassaati dakaarassa takaara.m katvaa tathaagatoti evamettha padasiddhi veditabbaa.

[01] ^b^yathaavaadii tathaakaarii^eb^ti ye dhamme bhagavaa ``ime dhammaa akusalaa saavajjaa vi~n~nugarahitaa samattaa samaadinnaa ^a^P2.0191^ea^ ahitaaya dukkhaaya sa.mvattantii''ti ^a^M0.0351^ea^ paresa.m dhamma.m desento vadati, te dhamme ekanteneva saya.m pahaasi. ye pana dhamme bhagavaa ``ime dhammaa kusalaa anavajjaa vi~n~nuppasatthaa samattaa samaadinnaa hitaaya sukhaaya sa.mvattantii''ti vadati, te dhamme ekanteneva saya.m upasampajja vihaasi. tasmaa yathaavaadii bhagavaa, tathaakaariiti veditabbo. ^b^yathaakaarii tathaavaadii^eb^ti sammadeva siilaadiparipuura.navasena sammaa pa.tipanno saya.m yathaakaarii bhagavaa, tatheva dhammadesanaaya paresa.m tattha pati.t.thaapanavasena ^a^V0.0321^ea^ tathaavaadii. bhagavato hi vaacaaya kaayo anulometi, kaayassapi vaacaa. tasmaa yathaavaadii tathaakaarii, yathaakaarii tathaavaadii ca hoti. eva.mbhuutassa cassa yathaa vaacaa, kaayopi tathaa gato pavatto. yathaa ca kaayo, vaacaapi tathaa gataa pavattaati attho.

[03] ^b^abhibhuu anabhibhuuto^eb^ti upari bhavagga.m he.t.thaa aviiciniraya.m pariyanta.m katvaa tiriya.m aparimaa.naasu lokadhaatuusu bhagavaa sabbasatte abhibhavati siilenapi samaadhinaapi pa~n~naayapi vimuttiyaapi vimutti~naa.nadassanenapi, na tassa tulaa vaa pamaa.na.m vaa atthi, asamo asamasamo appa.timo appa.tibhaago appa.tipuggalo atulo appameyyo anuttaro dhammaraajaa devaana.m atidevo sakkaana.m atisakko brahmaana.m atibrahmaa. tato eva saya.m na kenaci abhibhuutoti anabhibhuuto. ^b^a~n~nadatthuu^eb^ti eka.msatthe nipaato. ya~nhi ki~nci neyya.m naama, sabba.m ta.m hatthatale aamalaka.m viya passatiiti ^b^daso^eb^. avipariita.m aasayaadiavabodhena hituupasa.mhaaraadinaa ca satte, bhaava~n~nathattuupanayavasena sa"nkhaare sabbaakaarena suci.n.navasitaaya samaapattiyo citta~nca vase vattetiiti ^b^vasavattii^eb^. ettaavataa abhibhavana.t.thena bhagavaa attano tathaagatabhaava.m dasseti.

[03] tatreva.m padasiddhi veditabbaa -- agado viya agado. ko panesa? desanaavilaaso ceva pu~n~nussayo ca. teneva hesa mahaanubhaavo bhisakko viya dibbaagadena sappe, sabbe parappavaadino sadevaka~nca loka.m abhibhavati. iti sabbalokaabhibhavane tatho avipariito desanaavilaaso ceva pu~n~nussayo ca agado assaati dakaarassa takaara.m katvaa ^a^M0.0352^ea^ tathaagatoti veditabbo. tena vutta.m ``sadevake, bhikkhave, loke...pe0... vasavattii, tasmaa tathaagatoti vuccatii''ti.

[03] gaathaasu ^a^P2.0192^ea^ ^b^sabbaloka.m abhi~n~naayaa^eb^ti tedhaatukalokasannivaasa.m jaanitvaa. ^b^sabbaloke yathaatatha^eb^nti tasmi.m tedhaatukalokasannivaase ya.mki~nci neyya.m, ta.m sabba.m yathaatatha.m avipariita.m jaanitvaa. ^b^sabbalokavisa.myutto^eb^ti catunna.m yogaana.m anavasesappahaanena sabbenapi lokena visa.myutto vippamutto. ^b^anuupayo^eb^ti sabbasmimpi loke ta.nhaadi.t.thiupayehi anuupayo tehi upayehi virahito.

[03] ^b^sabbaabhibhuu^eb^ti ruupaadiini sabbaaramma.naani, sabba.m sa"nkhaaragata.m, sabbepi maare abhibhavitvaa .thito. ^b^dhiiro^eb^ti dhitisampanno. ^b^sabbaganthappamocano^eb^ti sabbe abhijjhaakaayaganthaadike mocetvaa .thito ^a^V0.0322^ea^ veneyyasantaanepi attano desanaavilaasena tesa.m pamocanato sabbaganthappamocano. ^b^phu.t.thaassaa^eb^ti phu.t.thaa assa. kara.natthe ida.m saamivacana.m, phu.t.thaa anenaati attho. ^b^paramaa santii^eb^ti nibbaana.m. ta~nhi tena ~naa.naphusanena phu.t.tha.m. tenevaaha ``nibbaana.m akutobhaya''nti. atha vaa ^b^paramaa santii^eb^ti uttamaa santi. kataraa saati? nibbaana.m. yasmaa pana nibbaane kutoci bhaya.m natthi, tasmaa ta.m ^b^akutobhaya^eb^nti vuccati.

[03] ^b^aniigho^eb^ti niddukkho. ^b^sabbakammakkhaya.m patto^eb^ti sabbesa.m kammaana.m khaya.m pariyosaana.m accantaabhaava.m patto. ^b^vimutto upadhisa"nkhaye^eb^ti upadhisa"nkhayasa"nkhaate nibbaane tadaaramma.naaya phalavimuttiyaa vimutto. ^b^esa so^eb^ti eso so. ^b^siiho anuttaro^eb^ti parissayaana.m sahana.t.thena, kilesaana.m hanana.t.thena ca, tathaagato anuttaro siiho naama. ^b^brahma^eb^nti se.t.tha.m. ^b^cakka^eb^nti dhammacakka.m. ^b^pavattayii^eb^ti tipariva.t.ta.m dvaadasaakaara.m pavattesi.

[03] ^b^itii^eb^ti ^a^M0.0353^ea^ eva.m tathaagatassa gu.ne jaanitvaa. ^b^sa"ngammaa^eb^ti ^a^P2.0193^ea^ samaagantvaa. ^b^ta.m^eb^ ^b^namassantii^eb^ti ta.m tathaagata.m te sara.na.m gataa devamanussaa namassanti. mahantehi siilaadigu.nehi samannaagatattaa ^b^mahanta.m,^eb^ catuvesaarajjayogena ^b^viitasaarada.m^eb^. idaani ya.m vadantaa te namassanti, ta.m dassetu.m ^b^danto^eb^tiaadi vutta.m. ta.m uttaanatthameva.
[03] iti imasmi.m catukkanipaate cha.t.the sattame ca sutte va.t.ta.m kathita.m, pa.thamadutiyatatiyadvaadasamaterasamesu viva.t.ta.m kathita.m, sesesu va.t.taviva.t.ta.m kathitanti veditabba.m.
